text: Ned wog gɨtep ma gɨl nep kelɨg amnak1.11 Gos olap anɨgɨl mɨdeb. Onesimus ne Pilemon bɨ wog gɨñeb ne yolɨgup, kɨdek pɨlɨkɨl Pol yɨl owak. Apek Pol ayɨp mɨdɨl, ñɨg pakak. Pen ñɨn anɨb ak takaw kɨles tɨmel olap agɨlak, Bɨ wog gɨñeb ne pɨlɨk amek, bɨawl ne ak bɨ chɨm kadɨŋ gep okok agek, kɨli bɨ wog gɨñeb anɨb ak nop mab bak alaŋ chɨpɨl paklel kumnɨmuŋ agɨlak. ak pen, mɨñɨl yɨp wog gɨñɨl, nep wog gɨñɨl chɨlop gɨtep gɨnɨgeb.1.11 Glik takaw ak, yɨb Onesimus takaw jɨj anɨgɨl mɨdeb, bɨ gɨtep gep ak.
